titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Paul D. Wellstone, a Senator from the State of Minnesota.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 598.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/12/2002--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Minnesota Senator Paul D. Wellstone.
